dados_extraidos.titulo: The Role of Blockchain in Finance Beyond Cryptocurrency: Trust, Data Management, and Automation
dados_extraidos.mecanismos_conformidade: Blockchain can be integrated as an external service that facilitates AML compliance by adapting the inherent transparent and immutable ledger of transactions while maintaining consumer due diligence.
dados_extraidos.lacunas_identificadas: The significant challenges of financial regulation and global collaboration due to complexity.
